name: Beyond Sight
description: 'Beyond Sight' is not just an art competition; it's an immersive experience that transcends the visual realm. In this event, participants will engage in a blind painting challenge where communication becomes the brushstroke and imagination takes center stage. The competition is designed to explore the power of collaboration and the limitless potential of creativity, even in the absence of sight. This is a blind painting event where participants come in pairs, one is the blindfolded artist who puts on a blind fold and picks up the brush, the other is the guide who instructs using words only.
tagline: Brushstrokes and Blunders: A Hilarious Art Adventure!

name: Luminous Ink
description: The Luminous Ink Event invites participants to illuminate Meraz 4.0 nights with radiant tattoo art using enchanting radium paints. A celebration of creativity and luminescence, this unique competition challenges artists to transform their bodies or their partner's into glowing canvases. In the embrace of the night, participants craft mesmerizing designs that come alive with ethereal radiance. As moonlight bathes Meraz 4.0, these luminous tattoos cast a spell, turning each participant into a living masterpiece. This event transcends a mere competition; it's a vibrant showcase of self-expression, imagination, and the magical fusion of art and radiance, making Meraz 4.0 nights truly unforgettable.
tagline: Uncover your hidden glow: A night of luminous, temporary tattoos!

name: Bridging the Blanks
description: Get ready to embark on an artistic journey of unlimited potential with 'Bridging the Blanks,' an exhilarating online art event! As the event kicks off, participants will receive a treasure trove of prompts—all waiting to be transformed into breathtaking visual masterpieces. With an array of prompts at your fingertips, each artist will have the freedom to choose the one that speaks to their soul, igniting their creativity and fueling their imagination. Armed with traditional fine arts mediums, from paintbrushes to pencils, participants will dive headfirst into their chosen prompt, bridging the gap between inspiration and creation. Whether you're drawn to the whimsy of abstract expressionism or the meticulous detail of realism, 'Bridging the Blanks' offers a platform for artists of all styles and skill levels to shine. Join us online for a week of artistic exploration, camaraderie, and the chance to bring your unique vision to life in a world of endless possibilities!
tagline: Fill the void, bridge the gap, let your artistic voice clap!

name: In10sity
description: I 'Get ready to ignite the stage at Meraz Fest's electrifying event, 'In10sity'! Gather your dance crew and prepare to dazzle the audience with your dynamic moves. In this exhilarating group dance competition, you'll have the chance to showcase your talent and passion for dance. Whether you're a hip-hop crew, a contemporary ensemble, or a fusion team, In10sity welcomes all styles and genres. Bring your energy, creativity, and synchronized choreography as you compete for the spotlight. Don't miss this opportunity to shine and make memories that will last a lifetime. Join us at Meraz Fest and let your in10sity shine through! '
tagline: Step It Up: Dance Beyond Boundaries!

name: Dance Solitaire
description: Dance Solitaire  'The solo dance competition of Meraz- DANCE SOLITAIRE is a thrilling showcase of individual artistic expression and talent, where participants captivate the audience with their unique choreography and emotive performances. Dancers, adorned in dazzling costumes, display a fusion of creativity, technique, and passion as they interpret music through their movements. The competition celebrates diversity in dance styles, from contemporary and hip-hop to classical forms, highlighting the dancer's skill and storytelling ability.   It contains 3 rounds: 1. Online Round ( For selection for stage round ) 2. Stage Rounds      1. Pre-Prepared Choreo      2. Prop Usage Round  Let's come together and experience this exhilarating event, uniting performers and spectators in the joy of dance'

name: Virtual Groove
description: 'Get ready to break barriers and ignite the virtual stage with Meraz. Distance is no longer a restriction as dancers from all over come together to showcase their talent and passion. Join us for an unforgettable celebration of dance and creativity with 'Virtual Groove' featuring two captivating rounds! 1. Preliminary Showcase 2. Emotion Ensemble In the Preliminary Showcase, dancers can unleash their creativity by selecting any dance style and song and showcasing their skills. After evaluation, the excitement continues with the Emotion Ensemble, where selected participants can explore diverse dance forms and emotions, delivering a single take performance while portraying an emotion of their choice. Get ready to dazzle the virtual stage with your talent and passion! '
tagline: Dance Beyond Distance, Groove Online.

name: Euphony
description: Embark on a musical journey from the comfort of your own space with our Online Singing Competition-EUPHONY! This virtual spectacle invites talented soloists to showcase their vocal brilliance. Immerse yourself in a diverse array of musical genres and witness breathtaking performances, all delivered from the heart. The digital stage is set to come alive with raw talent, each note resonating through screens. Engage with the competition, cheer for your favorites, and experience the enchantment of music brought directly to your fingertips. Don't miss this opportunity to celebrate the harmony of voices in our online extravaganza!
tagline: Where screen transform into stages!!

name: SurReal
description: The music club of IIT Bhilai, Swara, proudly presents the 4th edition of Sur-Real, a solo singing competition for aspiring singers to showcase their talent and compete for exciting prizes. This event promises an evening filled with soul-stirring melodies, passionate performances, and a celebration of the raw and unbridled talent that resides within each participant. So, whether you're a seasoned music enthusiast or a casual listener, join us for an unforgettable evening of music, passion, and discovery. 'SUR-REAL' is not just a competition; it's a celebration of the incredible power that lies within the human voice. Get ready to be moved, inspired, and amazed as our soloists take you on a musical journey like no other!
tagline: Soulful sur, rhythmic taal

name: SHREDDED:Battle of Bands
description: Get ready for an electrifying clash of musical titans in our Battle of Bands Competition-SHREDDED! Witness the stage ignite as dynamic bands from diverse genres go head-to-head in a fierce musical showdown. Each group will unleash their unique sound, creating a sonic landscape that transcends boundaries. From soulful ballads to high-energy anthems, the competition promises an exhilarating display of musical prowess. Amplify the excitement by tuning in, supporting your favorite bands, and experiencing the adrenaline of live music. Join us for an unforgettable night where the battle isn't just for victory but for the sheer love of rocking the stage!
tagline: Where Music Sparks the Fight!

name: CinéMeraz
description: CinéMeraz is all about capturing special moments of “ Meraz”  in your smartphone/camera while enjoying them. This is a one-person event in which the participant has to record the short clips of “Meraz” right from the beginning of the fest, then at last have to submit a compiled video made up of these short clips.
tagline: CinéMeraz: Unleash Your Meraz Moments, Capture. Connect. Compile.

name: SUS - Shot Ur Story
description: This will be an open-to-all contest as we will be accepting online submissions of short movies through a Google form.
tagline: Embark on a Cinematic Odyssey: Craft Your Narrative Through the Lens

name: Déjà vu
description: This will be an open-to-all contest as we will be accepting online submissions of a small segment from a movie or web series based on the theme provided.
tagline: Wait a minute! I've seen this before...

name: MELAS Quiz
description: Explore the diverse realms of human creativity and passion in this quiz encompassing Music, Entertainment, Literature, Arts, and Sports. Test your knowledge across cultural dimensions, from identifying iconic melodies and literary masterpieces to recognizing celebrated works of art and memorable moments in sports history. Engage with questions that span the spectrum of human expression, from the harmonies of music to the thrill of sports competitions. Whether you're a culture connoisseur or a sports enthusiast, this quiz promises an entertaining journey through the rich tapestry of human achievement and creativity in the realms of music, entertainment, literature, arts, and sports.
tagline: Sawaalo ka MELA

name: General Quiz
description: Dive into the diverse world of knowledge with our General Quiz, a captivating challenge that spans a multitude of subjects. From science and history to pop culture and current events, this quiz is designed to test your broad understanding of the world around you. Explore questions that touch on various domains, keeping you on your toes with a mix of intriguing facts and thought-provoking inquiries. Whether you're a trivia enthusiast or just curious about the world, this General Quiz is an engaging way to broaden your knowledge and have fun while doing it. Get ready for a journey through the vast landscape of general knowledge!
tagline: Explore, Engage, Excel in the ultimate general quiz

name: NSFW quiz
description: Explore challenging and edgy terrain with our NSFW Quiz, delving into questions that push the boundaries of traditional content. This quiz navigates through adult themes, humor, and unconventional knowledge, making it suitable for a mature audience seeking an unconventional and entertaining experience. Test your wits on topics that spark curiosity and elicit a playful exploration of subjects typically considered outside the norm. This NSFW Quiz offers a unique and engaging opportunity for adults to embrace a lighthearted yet risqué journey through questions that add a touch of spice to the traditional quiz format.
tagline: Do not peek👀

name: Phantom - UI Competition
description: Phantom is an annual UI/UX Design event that challenges participants to showcase their creativity and innovation in designing user interfaces. This year's theme is centered around creating a Task Management App that caters to both personal and professional users. The participants are expected to design an app that enhances productivity, simplifies task organization, and provides an exceptional user experience across various devices.

name: Artvile - Illustrator competition
description: Are you an art lover ? Here’s the opportunity for you to show all your creativity through illustrations. Meraz 4.0 provides you a platform to be creative and bag a lot of prizes. Just be Creative!
tagline: Carefully disguised as a responsible adult.

name: Murder Mystery
description: A murder mystery is a themed event where there are fictional characters in a fictional story. The Participants will then work together to solve a fictitious murder which occurs during the event. Most of the characters are gray. They are all suspects of the murder and have to be investigated by the participating teams to solve the mystery. Characters can’t lie but misleads the participants in different ways.
tagline: Bringing out the Sherlock Holmes in you🧐

name: Pukaar
description: Experience the power of street theater at Meraz Fest in IIT Bhilai with 'Pukaar'. This nukkad natak event is more than just a performance; it's a resonant call for societal transformation. Through gripping narratives and impassioned performances, 'Pukaar' delves into the heart of social issues, igniting conversations and inspiring action. Join us as we explore the complexities of human existence, from tales of injustice to stories of resilience and hope. Let your voice merge with the chorus of change as we unite in our quest for a brighter, more inclusive future. 'Pukaar' beckons you to listen, to reflect, and to act.
tagline: Baat Niklegi To Phir, Door Talak Jaayegi

name: Photo Of the Fest - Candid Edition
description: an immersive photography event capturing spontaneous moments and genuine emotions. Unleash your creativity, explore candid shots, and celebrate the beauty of unposed moments. Whether you're a seasoned photographer or a casual enthusiast, this event is your canvas to capture life's unscripted stories through the lens
tagline: Unveil Life's Unscripted Beauty Through Your Lens

name: Online Theme Photography
description: Participate  for a captivating virtual experience where participants can showcase their unique perspectives on the given theme
tagline: Capture, Conquer, Clasp rewards

name: Shutter Quest
description: Participants will draw themes or specific items randomly, and the challenge is to capture a stunning photo inspired by their chosen element. It's a journey of spontaneity and creativity, turning ordinary moments into extraordinary images

name: MUN
description: Model United Nations (MUN) aims to replicate the United Nations, with students representing different countries to solve world issues. We will be  hosting two committees:  United Nations Security Council: Agenda - Israeli-Palestine Conflict United Nations Human Rights Council: Agenda - Same sex marriage should be legalised Duration of each committee is 1 hr. Registrations can be done individually or in teams of 2
tagline: Where The Future Leaders of the World Meet

name: Poetry Writing
description: Online Hindi poetry writing competition where  participants have to write a romantic  poem in hindi  with restrictions on some cliché words which are generally used in romantic poetry, mentioned in the rulebook. One participant can submit only one pdf file  within the given deadline.  Any kind of  profanity is strictly prohibited. Any entry not following the rule will be disqualified
tagline: Kalam ko Kahne do

name: Anime review
description: online Anime Review Writing  competition where participants have to write a review on any of their favourite animes within the given word limits. Participants can give review on plot, characters, moral and any aspect of the anime. One participant per team.  One participant can submit only one pdf file  within the given deadline.
tagline: That's how most idiots screw upscrew up

name: Escape Room
description: Welcome to the Abandoned Hostel, a chilling setting where the lines between reality and imagination blur. As you step into this immersive escape room experience, you'll find yourself transported to a forgotten world where the echoes of the past haunt every corner. This escape room is designed to raise awareness about mental health issues and encourage empathy and understanding towards those who struggle with them. It's intended as an immersive experience to provoke thought and discussion while providing an entertaining challenge for participants.

name: Attire Spectra
description: Participants are invited to join Attire Spectra, an event where creativity knows no bounds. Experience a fusion of vintage elegance, futuristic innovation, and cultural diversity on a vibrant runway. Prepare for a captivating display of artistry and live performances that redefine fashion's boundaries. Don't miss your chance to take part in this transformative celebration of style.
